chapter_1.title: free. fun. effective.
chapter_1.text: Learning with Maestro is fun, and it really works! With our short and interactive lessons, earn points, level up, and develop your developer skills.

chapter_2.title: a scientific method
chapter_2.text: We use research-based teaching methods combined with fun content to create lessons that effectively teach written and spoken comprehension and expression!

chapter_3.title: always motivated
chapter_3.text: We help you build the habit of practicing languages through our fun features and exciting challenges.

chapter_4.title: personalized learning
chapter_4.text: Designed to adapt to your level and help you learn at your own pace, our lessons combine the best of artificial intelligence and linguistics.

chapter_5.title: maestro certification
chapter_5.text: Our practical, quick, and affordable test integrates the latest assessment technologies and artificial intelligence. Now you can evaluate your developer level precisely, anytime, anywhere.

register.title: Which language do you want to learn?

language_description.HTML: The backbone of the web, HTML structures the content of every website.
language_description.CSS: The art of style, CSS makes the web beautiful and responsive.
language_description.JavaScript: The engine of interactivity, JavaScript brings websites to life.
language_description.PHP: A pioneer in server-side, PHP powers dynamic web experiences.
language_description.SQL: The language of databases, SQL helps you store and retrieve data efficiently.
language_description.Vue js: The progressive JavaScript framework, Vue.js simplifies modern web development.
language_description.React: Facebook's UI library, React makes building dynamic interfaces easier.
language_description.Angular: Google's powerful framework, Angular is a complete solution for web apps.
language_description.Laravel: The PHP framework for artisans, Laravel redefines web development simplicity.
language_description.Symfony: The robust PHP framework, Symfony is built for large-scale applications.
language_description.Python: Python, versatile and flexible, is perfect for web, AI, and beyond.
language_description.Java: The enterprise favorite, Java powers scalable and secure applications.
